definitions.definition: The final process or decree (following beatification ) by which the name of a deceased person is placed in the catalogue ( canon ) of saints and commended to perpetual veneration and invocation.
The state of being canonized or sainted .
Introduction into a canon of artistic or literary works.

main_definition: ( Christianity ) The final process or decree (following beatification ) by which the name of a deceased person is placed in the catalogue ( canon ) of saints and commended to perpetual veneration and invocation.
secondary_definitions: The state of being canonized or sainted .
Introduction into a canon of artistic or literary works.
